hibernate-mapping.query: UPDATE Study s SET s.viewsCount = s.viewsCount + 1 WHERE s.id = :studyId
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT id, created, title, description, speaker, link, start_min, start_sec, views_count FROM (SELECT s.*, setweight(to_tsvector(title), 'A') || setweight(to_tsvector(description), 'B') || setweight(to_tsvector('simple', speaker), 'C') as document FROM study s ) p_search WHERE p_search.document @@ to_tsquery(:searchPattern)
